description: These stuffed peppers make an impressive veggie main course and slow cooking enhances all the flavours in the filling.
name: Slow Cooker Stuffed Capsicums Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the oil in a large pan on medium high heat and cook the onions for 5-6 minutes to soften. Add the mushrooms and cook for 5 minutes. Stir in the garlic and kale and cook for 1 minute then add the walnuts and a tablespoon of water and cook for 2-3 minutes.

Remove the pan from the heat, sprinkle the feta on top and mix well. Slice the bottom of each capsicum so it can stand, cut off the top and scoop out the seeds. Fill each capsicum with the vegetable mix and place the lid back on top.
Stand the capsicums upright in the slow cooker and cook for 3 hours on medium, until the capsicums are tender.
Serve with a drizzle of pesto on each stuffed capsicum and a side salad.
